question:
Which of the following pairs are correct?
(1) M.S. Subbulakshmi - Carnatic vocalist
(2) Ravi Shankar - Sitar
(3) Birju Maharaj - Bharatnatyam
(4) Alla Rakha - Tabla instrumentalist
explanation: Brijmohan Mishra is popularly known asÂ Pandit Birju Maharaj. He is an exponent of the Handia, Allahabad Kalka-Bindadin gharana of Kathak dance in India.
